outputs.output_descr: The IGAD Initiative approach focuses on South-South direct knowledge transfer through the secondment of regional civil servants into the civil service of the RSS. Under the IGAD Initiative, up to 200 Civil Service Support Officers (CSSOs) from Kenya, Uganda and Ethiopia are selected, jointly by both Governments, and seconded to the RSS civil service. CSSOs are deployed for two years with the specific goal of providing direct on the job training and general mentoring to their South Sudanese 'twin'.

project_descr: IGAD Regional Initiative for Capacity Enhancement in South Sudan
